<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/community/event"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new event with the parameters (title, content, type) specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"title":{"description":"Event title","type":"string"},"content":{"description":"Event content","type":"string"},"type":{"description":"Event type","type":"integer"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Newly created event","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"Text":{"type":"string","example":"Text of feed"},"Poll":{"type":"object","properties":{"PollType":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","enum":["SimpleAnswer","MultipleAnswer"],"description":"[0 - SimpleAnswer, 1 - MultipleAnswer]","example":"0"},"EndDate":{"type":"string","example":"2020-12-07T13:56:02.2859248Z"},"StartDate":{"type":"string","example":"2020-12-07T13:56:02.2859248Z"},"Voted":{"type":"boolean","example":"false"},"Votes":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","example":"133"},"Name":{"type":"string","example":"Variant 1"},"Votes":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"100"}},"title":"VoteWrapper"}}},"title":"PollWrapper"},"Id":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","example":"10"},"Title":{"type":"string","example":"Manager"},"Created":{"type":"string","example":"2020-12-07T13:56:02.2729203Z"},"Updated":{"type":"string","example":"2020-12-07T13:56:02.2729203Z"},"Type":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","enum":["None","News","Order","Advert","AllNews","Poll","All"],"description":"[0 - None, 1 - News, 2 - Order, 4 - Advert, 7 - AllNews, 8 - Poll, 15 - All]","example":"1"},"CreatedBy":{"type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"},"DisplayName":{"type":"string","example":"Mike Zanyatski"},"Title":{"type":"string","example":"Manager"},"AvatarSmall":{"type":"string","example":"url to small avatar"},"ProfileUrl":{"type":"string","example":"\\/Products\\/People\\/Profile.aspx?user=administrator"}},"title":"EmployeeWraper"}},"title":"EventWrapperFull"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
